text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Splendid!! You've completed your goal!! 
Applause!! Applause!!!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Depending on the horsegirl you're training, 
their goals will be different.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
When you're training, please train your horse 
girl with the aim of achieving her goals!
